document.discussion_title: 'All Bluestar files already in public domain'
document.topic_text: You are here: Home » India 'All Bluestar files already in public domain' Please enable the javascript of your browser to see the video. URL: Comment After Union Minister Harsimrat Kaur demanded that Operation Bluestar files be declassified, Brig Israr Khan who was a part of the operation has questioned the Akali Dal, saying that all the files are already in public domain.
